archimate:Goal.name: Common IAM Services Enabled for Tietoevry Connect
archimate:Goal.documentation:
Common IAM Services Enabled for Tietoevry Connect - Internal Identity & Access Management taking care internal systems and users - External Identity & Access Management taking care internal systems and users
These services allow us to onboard external customers to our external IAM solution which allows these identities to be used in for example ServiceNow (and their in-country instances). External IAM covers also the Single-Sign-On / Federation functions which are also used be for example ServiceNow for authenticating users to the system.
Define and deploy Common IAM service which realizes the agreed use-cases covering:
- Identity Management (Internal and External identities) - Authentication Services (for example SSO, Federation) - Authorization Services ( - Access Management Services
